name: Seeking Stowaways
description:
Seeking stowaways is a prop hunt game with a new twist.
Some of the players will be the seeker and the rest have to hide as props.

Lock by pressing L but dont get too comfortable!
Your fellow player can change you by pressing Z and you will be changed automatically at 25% of the game time.

If you get a prop you're not sure you can hide with, you can change yourself by pressing X. But beware, you can only do this 3 times per game.

Who will be caught first and who will survive? Gather your friends (if you have those) and find out!

When done playing: Please do take the time to fill in this form. It would help us out a lot. : https://forms.gle/xnQDpCVPYhBwh2zH6
